valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 8 Sep 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 9 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low northwest of Bailey 977 expected northwest Iceland 987 by midday tomorrow. New low expected Rockall 1001 by same time
